name: Deep Space Dash
description: Deep Space Dash is a third person futuristic space runner. You are a convict in an intergalactic high-security prison, at an unknown location. You have managed to escape your cell but you are lost in a huge maze.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz or better Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows latest version Processor: 2.5 GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: If you like games like Race The Sun, F-Zero X, etc. you will also like this game. It might need more work on it, but it is really nicely done. I really like this maze mode.
It is bad. Like, really BAD.
